thread.title: Don't understand all the great reviews - Review
thread.title_full: Don't understand all the great reviews - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Travellin4ever
title: Don't understand all the great reviews - Review
text:
We stayed here for 4 nights, and aside from getting a good rate, there was nothing great about this hotel. Granted, the hotel is in the middle of Times Square, but it's very noisy and very busy all the time.
Our room was old, very old. The furniture was old, the carpet was old, the bathroom fixtures were old. This place is in desperate need of a make over.
The tv would lose signal all the time and freeze.
We were on the 22nd floor and we could still here street noise and had trouble sleeping.
I didn't find the staff overly helpful or friendly.
Would never stay here again.
